amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce a SEC rule pursuant to Section 1502 of the Dodd-Frank Act relating to conflict minerals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Huizenga.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
